'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}. It is located north of [[Razai Passage]], at the coordinates 8° 53' N 45° 25' E.

==Background==
Desert and "home" of [[Belranga]], the Crystal Empress. She is one of the four [[Mega Boss Battles|mega bosses]].
title: The Crystal Desert
